title: How to Survive
description: You are shipwrecked on an isolated island, a desperate castaway in a total freakshow world. How will you survive?  Collect the pages of a Survival Guide and figure it out, of course! Find food, water, and shelter before you perish. Uh oh, is it getting dark? Figure out how to get through the night! While you’re at it, gather up some of this awesome stuff and piece together over 100 handmade weapons and tools—from shotguns to Molotov cocktails. Now you can defend yourself and your friends like a boss!  • Choose one of the three playable characters, each with different characteristics and skill trees. • Explore four islands filled with unique flora and fauna and a variety of abhorrent monstrosities • Collect “Survival guide” video chapters to learn tips that will save your life! • Play with a friend offline through the story mode or go online and play with a friend through 8 demanding challenges. • Try the “Iron Man” difficulty for a demanding hardcore game experience.

childDownloads.title: How to Survive "Heat Wave" Abby's Pack
childDownloads.description: On a tropical island night, all you need is some fireworks to bring a smile to your face, right? Well, now you can light ‘em up all on your own.  Equip Abby with a fireproof suit and teach her how to craft incendiary bullets. Because who doesn’t want to walk through flames while lighting their enemies on fire? Not just for pyromaniacs, kids! Get ‘em while they’re hot!  • Ready to be smoking hot (but not burned)? Then get in that fireproof suit and strut your stuff! • Walk through flaming bushes unharmed. Toss those Molotov cocktails with wild abandon! • What’s better than firing ammo? Firing FIRE AMMO, of course. Master the incendiary bullet crafting skill to make your guns shoot flaming projectiles.

childDownloads.title: Bone Armor
childDownloads.description: How to Survive Bone Armor. Give those zombies something to chew on! Helmet, gas mask, breastplate, plus arm and leg protectors made out of bones, leather and old rubber tires… the finest handmade armor is yours to own now!

childDownloads.title: How to Survive "Heat Wave" x 3 Pack
childDownloads.description: On a tropical island night, all you need is some fireworks to bring a smile to your face, right? Well, now you can light ‘em up all on your own.  Equip all 3 playable characters with a fireproof suit and teach them how to craft incendiary bullets. Because who doesn’t want to walk through flames while lighting their enemies on fire? Not just for pyromaniacs, kids! Get ‘em while they’re hot! • Ready to be smoking hot (but not burned)? Then get in that fireproof suit and strut your stuff! • Walk through flaming bushes unharmed. Toss those Molotov cocktails with wild abandon! • What’s better than firing ammo? Firing FIRE AMMO, of course. Master the incendiary bullet crafting skill to make your guns shoot flaming projectiles.

childDownloads.title: How to Survive "Kovac's Rules" trailer
childDownloads.description: Watch the trailer and learn the 7 basic rules of Survival from Kovac, the writer of the Ultimate Survival Guide! When you’re stranded on an island and surrounded by unholy creatures you’ll need all the help you can get. Learn to take care of your basic needs by finding food, water and shelter.  Combine anything & everything you can find, from sticks and stones to scuba bottles and tubes, to create your own equipment of handmade tools and weapons: axes, bows, boomerangs, shotguns, Molotov Cocktails… Let’s make sure those zombies know who’s got the brains around here!

childDownloads.title: How to Survive Launch trailer
childDownloads.description: Would you know how to survive the zombie apocalypse? Watch the trailer and find out if you have the guts and the brains to craft your way out of this nightmare. Explore 4 different islands blooming with exotic flora and fauna. Meet other survivors and collect survival tips from the ultimate survival guide written by the amazing Kovac.  Face dehydration, starvation and deadly wildlife. Find shelter and craft your tools out of whatever you can get your hands on. Battle hordes of undead monstrosities with your handmade weapons: from axes and shotguns to boomerangs or explosive arrows. The choices you take will determine whether you wind up dead, undead, or alive!

childDownloads.title: How to Survive "Mother knows best" trailer
childDownloads.description: When it comes to survival, sometimes you have to throw out the rule book   Watch the first trailer for new arcade – action survival title, How to Survive, in which players must battle across a Zombie infested archipelago; forced to fulfil the most basic of needs - food, water and shelter - and make use of anything & everything. Whatever you can get your hands on to craft weapons and tools, from handmade shotguns to fishing rods or Molotov cocktail; just to make it through the night.   Along the way players will encounter an ensemble of characters – some friendly, some less so – including the mysterious Kovac; author of the How to Survive guide.  Will his work lead you to safety?

childDownloads.title: Icon T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Do you have a hard time remembering your basic survival needs? No need to panic, they’re right there on your shirt!  Let everyone know How to Survive with this iconic shirt… Eat! Drink! Sleep!

childDownloads.title: Kovac’s Mask
childDownloads.description: How to Survive Kovac Mask. Follow in the footsteps of the master survivalist himself and author of the ultimate Zombie Survival Guide... wear Kovac’s mask with pride, survivor!

childDownloads.title: Metal Plate armor
childDownloads.description: How to Survive Metal Plate armor. Much more than just a fashion statement! Download the finest armor, handmade from leather, rubber tires and rusty metal plates to knock ‘em dead... or undead… oh, you know!

childDownloads.title: Yellow T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: You played the game and lived to tell the tale! We already know that’s pretty cool, but it’s time everyone else knew too: show your true colours with this How to Survive yellow t-shirt!
